website_summaries.verdict: The Etnies Fader is one of the brand's longest-running shoe models, and it has gained a loyal following throughout its shelf life. Designed for skate performance, the Etnies Fader boasts of excellent durability, impact protection, and old-school skate style that naturally resonated well with skaters. But its superb comfort, superior craftsmanship, versatility and reasonable price are what captured most of the consumers' interest and the reasons behind five-star ratings in most of the reviews.
pros: A significant number of shoe users find pleasure in the Etnies Fader as it is very comfortable
A few reviewers with foot problems swear by this pair as, according to them, it efficiently relieves pain
It is available in a multitude of colorways
Most purchasers commended the kick's materials and construction for being well made
The style of this sneaker suits a wide selection of ensembles and age range
Several loyal users of the Fader mentioned how they never use other sneakers for many years
Some added that as long as the shoe is in production, they will continue wearing it
A good number of users who do extreme sports like BMX and skateboard prefer this sneaker due to its grippy outsole, durability, and great board feel
Some reviewers who use it as a casual shoe shared that it lasted them multiple years before it wore out
Majority of the purchasers found the Etnies Fader to fit true to size
At $65, a lot of buyers find this kick to be an excellent product with great value for money
cons: A few commenters didn’t like that it gets dirty quickly

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, look great, go with everything
customer_reviews.text: Who didn't love a pair of Etnies as a teenager? These shoes are extremely plush and comfortable. Tuck the ends of the laces down the shoe and then you can simply slip them on and go. They also seem to go with everything. Following six months of wear the only real difference from being new is the bits of white sock stuck to the inside of them. They stay plush for years and are very hard to damage.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah B

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted quite a bit for the price, decent enough quality too, just don't expect them to last longer than 6 months before the soles start wearing away letting water/stones get in. Would buy again though just to have a spare pair.
customer_reviews.author: david367

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and they look brilliant. Initially they rubbed in a few places but after wearing them in they fit great now. Very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria B.

customer_reviews.title: Generally uncomfortable and cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable to wear and feel like plastic, both the main shoe and in the sole. You can even hear yourself tapping while walking. Laces feel weak but have held up so far. Given them a while to break in but the heel support at the back has not softened and is still digging in to my achilles tendon.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W

customer_reviews.title: Gd
customer_reviews.text: They seem like a gd wearing shoe, iv only had a few days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes shame about the colour
customer_reviews.text: The fit is very good, They look good, however I ordered the ones with a white sole and I got ones with a black sole. I needed them ASAP so couldn’t send them back
customer_reviews.author: Daniel H.

customer_reviews.title: My gf's favourite
customer_reviews.text: Superb, excellent and prompt service. This is my gf's 2nd pair. They look great in black.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, good quality trainer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent trainers this is our 3rd pair they are so comfortable and good quality. 100% service and delivery. Would recommend 100% you will not ve disappointed
customer_reviews.author: the best

customer_reviews.title: fantastic pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: They're extremely comfortable especially for people like me with big feet.
customer_reviews.author: alex b.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe just too small. Need a size 5 but unfortunately sold out.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B A Green

customer_reviews.title: Took a little while to break in a couple of oddly-placed material seams on the inside which rubbed on my feet for the first week but now they're good.
customer_reviews.text: Understated & comfy shoes. Took a little while to break in a couple of oddly-placed material seams on the inside which rubbed on my feet for the first week but now they're good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B. P. Clarkson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for myself after wearing dc’s for 7 years, the shoe itself was made to perfection but unfortunately the size was too tight and had to return
customer_reviews.author: gareth

customer_reviews.title: I've had these before but this pair seems to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these before but this pair seems to be of inferior quality and slight bit smaller too, they're far from awful but I may not be getting Etnies in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Catharsis

customer_reviews.title: 5 star product.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, extremely comfortable and perform the task that skate shoes should! Would HIGHLY recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nysecia

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart!
customer_reviews.text: The sole of these shoes has started coming off after just a few weeks. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: chris jones

customer_reviews.title: New buyer of Etnies
customer_reviews.text: I've never bought Etnies before, but figured they were cheap enough to take a chance on. - Not the most comfortable trainer, but good enough for general daily footwear use. - Construction seems pretty good so far. Although i have noticed the soles aren't particularly flexible, so it will be interesting to see how they wear over a longer period of time (I'll try to remember to update this after a year or so to let you know). - The UK sizing is spot on. Overall I'd say they are definitely worth trying out since they're reasonably priced and well deserve a 4 Star rating (which depending how the soles wear over time, may increase to a 5 Star).
customer_reviews.author: PGA

customer_reviews.title: Great Trainers...But
customer_reviews.text: Really great trainers that are comfortable,lightweight and very hardwearing. The only problem I found with this "model" is that the sizing is one out to what I normally wear. i.e. I needed to send the UK 11 back and get a UK 12 instead, when every previous time Etnies has been good for a UK 11.
customer_reviews.author: Mart

customer_reviews.title: Comfy as always
customer_reviews.text: These sort of shoes are always good quality and very comfy, very similar to vans shoes of this sort of style.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

product_meta.title: Etnies Men's Fader Skate Shoe
product_meta.description: The Fader is a classic Etnies style that has a Foam Lite 1 insole, a midsole of egg crate construction and the outsole is 300NBS rubber, and a comfy padded tongue and collar.
